title: Emotion-Aware Transformer Encoder for Empathetic Dialogue Generation
desc: Enhanced dialogue empathy with an emotional classifier and Transformer XL model, achieving 95% accuracy and a BLEU score of 0.225.

title: Weather Prediction (Forecasting Weather Across Cities)
desc: Built an LSTM model with batch normalization and dropout layers to predict temperature and weather trends across cities, achieving 91% accuracy.

title: Sales Prediction
desc: A time series forecasting project predicting future sales across three product categories: Furniture, Technology, and Office Supplies using SARIMA, Prophet, and LSTM models.

title: Super Bowl Analytics
desc: Explored the impact of Super Bowl ads on beer sales using web scraping, data cleaning, visualization, and regression modeling to estimate ROI.

title: MoneyBall
desc: Explored predictive analytics for baseball player performance using Linear Regression, Random Forest, and XGBoost.

title: NYC Motor Vehicle Collision Analytics
desc: Cleaned NYC collision data, implemented dimensional modeling in Snowflake, and developed KPI dashboards in Tableau for collision analysis.
